description:
Sermon Notes helps you take detailed sermon notes during church.  You can record the pastor, title, and date with each sermon.  It also recognizes bible verses, and tapping and holding a verse will instantly display the scripture online - no more looking through menus to get to the verse you want to see.  You can search for sermons by typing in the sermon list, and can also send sermon notes using email.

Updates
1.0.2 - Fixes a problem where scriptures sometimes won't open.  Adds preferences to sort and filter sermon list by date.
1.0.3 - Adds support for full screen display on the Touchpad
versionNote: Adds support for full screen display on the Touchpad
